Project.shortdesc: The aim of the project is to encode 60,000 items totalling 3,000 hours of ITN content (1955 to date) and Reuters content (1896 to date). This represents 1% of the 300,000 hours of content currently held by ITN. A further 52,571 bulletin scripts totalling 893,707 pages will be digitised.
Project.name: NewsFilm online
